title: Classic User Created Webhook Schema
description: Sent whenever a new user is created in SaaSquatch program where the classic program is enabled.

imageUrl.title: Image Url
imageUrl.description: The URL to an image of this user

firstSeenIP.title: First Seen IP
firstSeenIP.description: The IP address of this user when they were first seen by SaaSquatch

lastSeenIP.title: Last Seen IP
lastSeenIP.description: The IP address of this user when they were most recently seen by SaaSquatch

dateCreated.title: Date Created
dateCreated.description: A timestamp of the date this user was created

referable.title: Referable
referable.description: True if this user can be referred in a program by other users

referredByCodes.title: Referred By Codes
referredByCodes.description: Any codes used to refer this user

cookieId.title: Anonymous Cookie User Id
cookieId.description: The anonymous cookie user identifier associated with this user if applicable (see anonymous users)

dateBlocked.title: Date Blocked
dateBlocked.description: The date the referral was blocked

customFields.title: Custom Fields
customFields.description: Any custom fields set for this user

segments.title: User Segments
segments.description: Any segments this user belongs to

..\\ReferralCodes.schema.json.title: Referral Codes
..\\ReferralCodes.schema.json.description: A map of programs to referral codes.

^[a-zA-Z0-9-]{1,64}$.title: Referral Code
^[a-zA-Z0-9-]{1,64}$.description: The primary referral code associated with the programId key

..\\UserCustomFields.schema.json.title: User Custom Fields Schema
..\\UserCustomFields.schema.json.description: Defines how custom fields can be specified on a user. Allows alphanumeric numbers and underscores.

..\\ProgramShareLinks.schema.json.title: Program Share Links
..\\ProgramShareLinks.schema.json.description: Links this user can share to make referrals

^[a-zA-Z0-9-]{1,64}$.title: Program Share Link
^[a-zA-Z0-9-]{1,64}$.description: The primary share links available for this program

cleanShareLink.title: Clean Link for Given Program
cleanShareLink.description: If the program's primary link is a vanity link then this will be the unencoded link, if not it is the UNKNOWN engagement medium and UNKOWN share medium link

MOBILE.title: Mobile Share Links
MOBILE.description: Share links tracked with the MOBILE engagement medium

EMAIL.title: Email Share Links
EMAIL.description: Share links tracked with the EMAIL engagement medium

UNKNOWN.title: Share Links
UNKNOWN.description: Share links tracked with the UNKNOWN engagement medium

DIRECT.title: Direct Share Link
DIRECT.description: Share link associated with the DIRECT share medium

DIRECT.title: Direct Share Link
DIRECT.description: Share link associated with the DIRECT share medium
